title: Delete minor sins in few minutes!
transcript: something that is so easy yet so huge in reward the prophet Allah taught us to say glory be to Allah and praise be to to him or as translated in some other books how perfect Allah is and I praise him a hundred times it takes less than three minutes subhanallahu Subhan Allah yet the reward is so huge that Allah azzawajal erases your sins even if they were as many as the foam of the ocean or the Seas it doesn't take much time but who Among Us is successful to be guided by Allah azzawajal into saying it
